email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Apply for COVID-19 Relief Funds Now!

Dear [Recipient],

As a representative of the Department of Health and Human Services, we understand the challenges that many individuals and businesses are facing due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. In an effort to provide support to those in need, we are offering relief funds to help alleviate the financial burden caused by this unprecedented crisis.

We have identified you as a potential candidate for this relief program and urge you to apply as soon as possible. By filling out the attached form, you will be eligible to receive up to $10,000 in financial assistance to help cover expenses such as rent, utilities, and groceries.

Please note that this form must be completed and submitted within the next 48 hours to be considered for the relief funds. Failure to do so may result in your application being delayed or denied.

We understand that these are challenging times, and we are here to support you every step of the way. Your well-being is our top priority, and we are committed to helping you through this difficult period.

Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to assisting you with your COVID-19 relief application.

Sincerely,

[Name]
Department of Health and Human Services

Attachment: COVID-19 Relief Fund Application Form
